snippet: Marcel Hirscher of Austria overcame a rapidly deteriorating course in warm weather to win a World Cup night slalom in Zagreb, Croatia, and take first in the overall standings.
abstract: Austrian skier Marcel Hirscher wins World Cup night slalom event in Zagreb, Croatia, and moves into first in overall standings.
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher of Austria overcame a rapidly deteriorating course in warm weather to win a World Cup night slalom in Zagreb, Croatia, and take first in the overall standings.
